name: I accidentally restarted the USSR
description:
Have you ever went on google and searched "I accidentally"? If you did then you saw that google autosuggest "I accidentally restarted the USSR". And also you've probably wondered who would search that for more than a one time joke.

In this game you will be able to play the tail of Igor Ivanov as he accidentally restarts the USSR.

  • A third person shooter with two weapons. The legendary ak47 and the less cooler rpg.
  • Race using Soviet Unions favourite piece of machinery, the O'Reliable Lada.
  • Interact with everything in the city to find out their story.
  • Help Igor shoot his way thought the police and take down Vadim.
